description: The Chrome Management API is a suite of services that allows GSuite domain administrators to view, manage and gain insights on their Chrome OS and Chrome Browser devices and users.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify next page in the list.

totalSize.description: Total number of installed apps matching request.

installedApps.description: List of installed apps matching request.

GoogleChromeManagementV1CountInstalledAp.description: Response containing details of queried installed apps.

permissions.description: Output only. Permissions of the installed app.

browserDeviceCount.description: Output only. Count of browser devices with this app installed.

disabled.description: Output only. Whether the app is disabled.

appInstallType.description: Output only. How the app was installed.

osUserCount.description: Output only. Count of ChromeOS users with this app installed.

appSource.description: Output only. Source of the installed app.
enumDescriptions: Generally for extensions and Chrome apps.

description.description: Output only. Description of the installed app.

appId.description: Output only. Unique identifier of the app. For Chrome apps and extensions, the 32-character id (e.g. ehoadneljpdggcbbknedodolkkjodefl). For Android apps, the package name (e.g. com.evernote).

homepageUri.description: Output only. Homepage uri of the installed app.

displayName.description: Output only. Name of the installed app.

appType.description: Output only. Type of the app.

GoogleChromeManagementV1FindInstalledApp.description: Response containing a list of devices with queried app installed.

devices.description: A list of devices which have the app installed. Sorted in ascending alphabetical order on the Device.machine field.

totalSize.description: Total number of devices matching request.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify the next page in the list.

GoogleChromeManagementV1BrowserVersion.description: Describes a browser version and its install count.

count.description: Output only. Count grouped by device_system and major version

system.description: Output only. The device operating system.

version.description: Output only. The full version of the installed browser.

deviceOsVersion.description: Output only. Version of the system-specified operating system.

channel.description: Output only. The release channel of the installed browser.

GoogleChromeManagementV1CountChromeVersi.description: Response containing requested browser versions details and counts.

totalSize.description: Total number browser versions matching request.

browserVersions.description: List of all browser versions and their install counts.

nextPageToken.description: Token to specify the next page in the list.

machine.description: Output only. The name of the machine within its local network.

deviceId.description: Output only. The ID of the device that reported this Chrome browser information.

GoogleChromeManagementV1Device.description: Describes a device reporting Chrome browser information.

title: Chrome Management API

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

name: chromemanagement

pageToken.description: Token to specify the next page in the list.

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

orderBy.description: Field used to order results. Supported order by fields: * machine_name * device_id

appId.description: Unique identifier of the app. For Chrome apps and extensions, the 32-character id (e.g. ehoadneljpdggcbbknedodolkkjodefl). For Android apps, the package name (e.g. com.evernote).

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

filter.description: Query string to filter results, AND-separated fields in EBNF syntax. Note: OR operations are not supported in this filter. Supported filter fields: * last_active_date

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 100.

findInstalledAppDevices.description: Generate report of devices that have a specified app installed.

countChromeVersions.description: Generate report of installed Chrome versions.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 100.

pageToken.description: Token to specify the next page in the list.

filter.description: Query string to filter results, AND-separated fields in EBNF syntax. Note: OR operations are not supported in this filter. Supported filter fields: * last_active_date

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

orderBy.description: Field used to order results. Supported order by fields: * app_name * app_type * install_type * number_of_permissions * total_install_count

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum and default are 100.

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

customer.description: Required. Customer id or "my_customer" to use the customer associated to the account making the request.

filter.description: Query string to filter results, AND-separated fields in EBNF syntax. Note: OR operations are not supported in this filter. Supported filter fields: * app_name * app_type * install_type * number_of_permissions * total_install_count * latest_profile_active_date * permission_name

pageToken.description: Token to specify next page in the list.
